name: The Underground Watcher/地下监察员
detailed_description:
Story

Xu Sisi is a young (?) lady who’s looking for a job.
In an occasional chance, she finds a short-term recruit advertisement from the government.
Everything goes smoothly, she gets this offer.
However, with a sudden visitor comes over her workplace, her job becomes not similar to any other colleagues. Xu’s childhood memory that she don’t want to mention is also gradually revealed.

Features

·This is an almost no-place-to-jump 2D platformer.
·Simple move list for skills.
·Monster.
·Basement upgrade system.
·Making money by Killing monsters! Pushing the story process by patrolling around the underground world.

short_description: This is a story about a girl working underground, experiencing some people and some things.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.8 Ghz+ Processor
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Screen resolution should be at least 1280*720.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.4 Ghz+ Processor
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB VRAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Screen resolution should be at least 1280*720.
